statements: DELETE FROM ProductionData WHERE id = 1 AND production_quantity > 100;
DELETE FROM ProductionData WHERE production_date < '2022-01-01' AND waste_quantity <= 50;
DELETE FROM historical_production_data WHERE production_id = 1001 AND production_date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM manufacturing_processes WHERE process_id = 2002 AND waste_reduction_rate < 0.5;
DELETE FROM production_data WHERE product_id = 100 AND production_quantity < 50;
DELETE FROM waste_data WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic' AND production_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM machine_data WHERE machine_name = 'Machine A';
DELETE FROM ProductionData WHERE production_quantity < 1000 AND production_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM WasteData WHERE discard_date < '2022-02-15' AND discard_reason ILIKE '%expired%';
